Articles.Content: I was away from KSP and the whole community since 1.0.4 for personal reasons. Plz tell me what is new and what is improved. I don't even know what version KSP is in. Is there x64 and other cool stuff?
x64 yes for Linux, hacked version for Windows, no for Mac. The same as previously. We are on the verge I think of hearing about 1.1 going to Q&A.

Is there x64 and other cool stuff?

May as well go away again and come back soonÃ¢â€žÂ¢ when 1.1 is out

It's 1.0.4. Nothing has changed. Welcome back.

This.

It's like waking up and asking what "year is it?" only to be horribly disappointed that you only slept for a few hours.

(^This comes across as me hating 1.0.4, I don't)

1.1 should be out SoonTM though.
